title: Libro
descript: This word means book. Some examples of the use of it are: '¡Dame ese libro!' = 'Give me that book!', 'Ese libro es grande' = 'That book is big'

title: Libro
descript: This word means book. Some examples of the use of it are: '¡Dame ese libro!' = 'Give me that book!', 'Ese libro es grande' = 'That book is big'

title: Lápiz
descript: This word means pencil. Some examples of the use of it are: 'Mi lápiz está roto' = 'My pencil is broken', '¡No te robes mi lápiz!' = 'Don't steal my pencil!'
